title: When will Amazfit GTR be launched in India? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Amazfit GTR, a modern smartwatch manufactured by giants Huami, is being launched this month, September 2019. There are two versions - GTR 47 mm and GTR 42 mm. The 47 mm is scheduled was launched on 12th September and the official date for the 42 mm version is scheduled as 29th September. Amazfit has cemented itself as a leading player in the smartwatch world of India. What sets this version apart from competitors is the impressive and unmatched screen display of 326 PPI. Along with this feature, the 47 mm smartwatch also boasts an impressive 24-day battery life, along with multiple sports modes, 5 ATM level water resistance, and high tech heart monitoring.
